meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>foot</radical>, as your <radical>mama</radical> says, was given the <radical>task</radical> to <kanji>dance</kanji>. Shake those two foots your mama gave you and dance dance dance!
readingMnemonic: You both <kanji>dance</kanji> so much that you develop an <reading>odo</reading>r (おど). Not just any odor, an odor particular to stinky dancing feet.
